<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-debugify-cpp-/debugifyfunctionpass">DebugifyFunctionPass</a></>}>
FunctionPass for attaching synthetic debug info to instructions within a single function, used with the legacy module pass manager. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-debugify-cpp-/debugifyfunctionpass/#details">More...</a>

  type="struct"

### findTerminatingInstruction() {#a9d5c5c93a898487fabe292e69b1b3c9e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Instruction &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;Debugify.cpp&#125;::findTerminatingInstruction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp; BB)</>}>
Find the basic block&#39;s terminating instruction.

Special care is needed to handle musttail and deopt calls, as these behave like (but are in fact not) terminators.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/debugify-cpp/#l00072">72</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/debugify-cpp">Debugify.cpp</a>.
